meanings.definition: A unit of genetic distance equal to one percent recombination.
meanings.sent1: In genetics, centimorgans help scientists understand how genes are inherited.
meanings.sent2: The geneticist calculated the distance between the two loci in centimorgans.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chromosome go to school? To learn about centimorgans!
meanings.sent4: The concept of centimorgans is like a road map showing the distance between genes.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a colorful diagram to explain centimorgans to the students.

meanings.definition: A measure of genetic linkage between two loci on a chromosome.
meanings.sent1: The centimorgans value indicated how closely the genes were linked on the chromosome.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the centimorgans to understand the genetic relationship between the loci.
meanings.sent3: Why did the DNA strand break up with the chromosome? It wanted some space in centimorgans!
meanings.sent4: The centimorgans measurement acted as a bridge connecting the genetic loci.
meanings.sent5: The concept of centimorgans made the complex genetic linkage easier to visualize.
